name: Math.sqrt()
content:
[description]

[short_description]

Takes the square root of x.

[/short_description]

There are some math calculations that require you to take the square root. *Math.sqrt(x)* does not change the value of x, rather it returns the the square root of x.

[/description]

palette_params.name: x
palette_params.description: A number to take the square root of

return_value: A number that is the square root of x
short_description: Takes the square root of x.
